items.title: IndusInd Bank proposes Borkar & Muzumdar as joint statutory auditor after RBI's approval
items.description: Borkar & Muzumdar is a firm of Chartered Accountants with over 75 years of experience in the field of Assurance, Taxation Consultancy and Financial Advisory Services.

items.title: Deadly Air India crash puts ambitious turnaround plans at risk
items.description: The incident marks the first-ever complete loss of a 787 and, as investigations get underway, questions are growing over how the jet exploded into a fireball including around the plane’s thrust

items.title: India open to easing EV rules as China’s rare earth curbs bite
items.description: Although the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers is yet to make a formal plea for paring the localization requirement, the industry body’s members have flagged the need in various consultations with the government.

items.title: Iran-Israel conflict: Crude surge, threat to shipping lanes keeping oil refiners on the edge
items.description: Higher crude prices squeeze Indian oil refiners as they have largely kept retail fuel prices unchanged in the domestic market despite volatility in the international market.

items.title: This hospital chain is aiming for high growth, but is it already priced in?
items.description: Max is on an aggressive expansion path with healthy medium-term growth visibility

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick: Can this consumption play take advantage of tailwinds?
items.description: Recent stock correction offers an opportunity to ride the next phase of growth, backed by smart acquisitions, operating leverage, and a favourable back-to-school season
